## MovableCachePolicy type

Cache policy for last known position of node

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MovableCachePolicy = 'session' | 'local' | 'none';
```

## Remarks

`'session'` &amp; `'local'` mean using session storage &amp; local storage, respectively.

## Example


```svelte
<div use:movable={{
   policy: 'session',
}} />
```
